title: Trimming, early 19th century
medium: White and colored silk in uncut voided velvet weave.
creditline: Gift of Mrs. Robert Woods Bliss, Dumbarton Oaks Collection
description: Crowned shield showing a lion rampant, red, yellow, and black; alternating with an ornament composed of interlacing band in blue with dots in red and yellow.

tombstone.epitaph:
Trimming, early 19th century.
early 19th century. White and colored silk in uncut voided velvet weave.. Gift of Mrs. Robert Woods Bliss, Dumbarton Oaks Collection. 1943-46-67.
